name: Mediterranean Diet
description: Rich in fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and olive oil.

name: Vegetarian Diet
description: Excludes red meat but allows fish, eggs, and dairy.

name: Keto Diet
description: High-fat, low-carb diet that promotes ketosis.

name: Paleo Diet
description: Emphasizes whole foods and avoids processed foods.

name: DASH Diet
description: Designed to lower blood pressure and improve heart health.

name: Flexitarian Diet
description: Primarily plant-based but allows occasional meat consumption.

name: Low-Carb Diet
description: Restricts carbohydrate intake for weight loss.

name: Intermittent Fasting
description: Alternates between periods of eating and fasting.

name: Weight Watchers
description: Focuses on portion control and balanced eating.

name: Custom Diet
description: Tailored to individual preferences and needs.
